title: Does Trump's term of office end on comet day, meteor shower, and kidneys?
subtitle: It is unlikely that American viewers will be able to take a glimpse of all three events of the sky.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The current mandate of United States President Donald Trump expires when the Electoral College voted on 14 December 2020, a day celebrated in some parts of the world that coincided with a comet, a meteor shower and a complete eclipse of the sun.
